ComicInfo.Penciller: Gary Davis,Paul Vincent Guinan,Phillip Norwood,Paul Guinan,Phillip Norwood,Paul Guinan,Gary Davis
ComicInfo.Summary:
The most eagerly-awaited storyline begins in this month's issue of Dark Horse Presents! They are the galaxy's most deadly alien races; now, the time has come for them to meet at last! It's the Aliens and Predator together in one story! The confrontation of the century brought to you by Randy Stradley and film designer (The Abyss and Robocop II) Phillip Norwood! The story will then continue in a full-color miniseries coming out next month! Also, Paul Guinan and Anina Bennet continue the story of The Heartbreakers--beautiful and deadly clones! Plus, the further "sword and sorcery" adventures of Delia and Celia by Gary Davis!
ChaptersAliens vs. PredatorDelia & Celia - The Great MarshHeartbreakers - Ceiling Zero
